phrases: There is not a single thing here...
I am so glad, Miss Kirishima!
Imagine, me taking this much damage
from someone whose kagune is well-matched to mine!
I did not think I would get to see you like this again.
It is like the passion from that earlier time...
Let me dress the area around Kaneki
It is absolutely not what I would hoped for...
We cannot have this, can we?
This will take... an awful long time... to heal...
Go ahead and eat your own flesh,
Just hold on... I am coming to...
She knows about both you and Kaneki, right?
I cannot let a woman this dangerous
Hide is to me, or Yoriko is to you.
What if that was Yoriko up there and not Miss Kimi?
I have to get rid of her,
to make sure that does not happen!
Tell me, oh tell me, the way it works
Who is that inside of me?
Here in this broken-down, broken-down world,
you laugh, without seeing a thing
I am just so damaged, I hold my breath and freeze
When I found you, it shook me
In this twisted world, I am gradually growing transparent and vanishing
Do not look for me; do not look at me
I do not wish to hurt you in a world
-the church, there were a number of
-We are still doing the daily prep, you know.
Do not mention the little things.
I see you have got your usual maggot-infested look on your face.
Mr. Nishio came to work at Anteiku.
For Miss Kimi's sake, as well,
I do not think you should take any more human lives.
With the food that we gather here,
you can live a relatively guilt-free life as a ghoul.
However, we make sure to exact a price.
That will be your labor here at Anteiku, Nishio.
Wow, I have to say, Mr. Nishio...
The more I look at you, the less you mesh with Anteiku's formalness.
I will kick you out of here.
We are still just doing the daily prep.
But then, what made you start working at Anteiku?
Do not tell me you are after Touka!
Speaking of Touka, is she still not feeling well?
Touka had not been at work since that day.
All sorts of things can happen in life.
With him not here, I have to be twice as together now.
Um, what is Hinami upset about, if I can ask?
We have not heard anything from him- from my husband, in some time.
So now she insists on going to see him.
Where is Hinami's father right now?
Things are awfully quiet here today, huh?
Take this with you and get on out of here.
You really do do good work.
I will get her with this...
W-Would you mind not coming around here anymore?
I see I have fallen into disfavor.
I just want to live in peace.
We will be together again soon.
But I wonder if you would tell me something first.
When the hell did you become a flunky of the humans?
was apparently mixed up in some dangerous business in the 13th Ward.
once Hinami was born, he got out of that for us.
He really is a good man.
To Hinami and me, he really is...
If I do not spoil Hinami, she will never get the chance to be spoiled.
It looks like it was worth the wait, was not it, Amon?
Using small fry to catch the bottom feeders.
Then again, this one is a bottom feeder in the truest sense.
What is the 13th Ward's big fish doing
Why do not we hear it straight from his own mouth?
Can you open up for me?
I do not want to talk to you!
I should not have raised my voice.
You miss Dad, do not you?
I think Dad misses you, too, Hinami.
But you see, if we go see him now, we will be in his way.
I am sorry to always make you put up with this.
Hmph, I will entertain you for two minutes.
I guess I did not step in close enough.
You can nail him with the next one.
what use might we have for this scum?
Jason managed to get away, huh?
There is nothing we could have done.
As long as we keep squashing them one by one,
another opportunity will come around again.
All right, since I am always making you put up with this,
I want to go get you a present to show you I am sorry.
It is about working tomorrow's shift.
I could not... kill that woman.
Hinami and Mrs. Ryoko were fighting...
but they were able to patch things up.
Looking at the two of them, I thought, families sure are nice.
mother and child does not care about being human or ghoul.
That should not be a surprise, but until my body ended up this way,
I did not have any idea.
If we could all come to realize that...
The relationship between Mr. Nishio and Miss Kimi
could serve as a guidepost for the way
things between human and ghoul could be, I thought.
I should not have opened my big mouth back there,
without knowing anything about you and Yoriko, and I am sorry.
Okay, I will let the manager know.
I am sure Touka must have thought so, too.
After the way she herself had been accepted.
if she had been rejected, after interacting with each other...
there would be no going back.
I hope she starts feeling better soon.
It means when it suddenly starts raining.
Were you being taught how to read?
Thank you for always doing this.
I learned all of the kanji in this book!
I want to learn even more words, so I can surprise Dad!
Also, Dad's birthday is coming up soon, right?
You want to give him a book as a present?
Okay, why do not we go to the bookstore?
Looks like we are in for a shower.
I was right, was not I?
When it suddenly starts raining, it is called a cloudburst.
Mr. Kaneki is well informed, huh?
I wonder if Dad knows, too.
If I know something Dad does not know, I am pretty amazing, huh?
What is come over you, Hinami?
It is been so long since I have gone out with you, Mom!
Come, on, Hinami, you are getting wet!
Are not we going to one other place?
I just remembered something I have to do.
But I would not want it raining any harder than this.
I would not be able to hear your death throes, after all.
Could I have a moment of your time,
You head on back to Anteiku ahead of me.
I will be sure to come back later.
I want to stay with you, Mom!
Is that supposed to be mother-daughter love?
I will not let you go!
Though the city sleeps, its buildings are always
Its belt lines morphing, snakes interlocking,
stirring up endorphins, and off you go, go, go
Souls ascend up into the night sky
Their procession and their faith both resembling
are an all but black shade of gray
an all but black shade of gray
Ah, tonight, you are the one I want
Ah, I want you to signal the end
You want to both wear these?
Is she seriously going for a pair look?
Well, it is a present and all.
Geez, these bangles are like horse crap.
I meant, you know, the good kind of horse crap-
